title: What are my chances of getting into the US Air Force Academy as an international applicant with an SAT score of 1,400 and a GPA of 3.8, but with no volunteer and athletic activity? - Quora

response.answer_text: Almost zero. International Students | Air Force Academy They admit about 15 students, nominated by their own country. You then go back, most likely to serve in your own country’s air force. International students who meet degree requirements will be awarded a Bachelor of Science degree, however, they are not commissioned in the United States Air Force.
